title: Galaxy Syndra (Concept)
body:
Hello~
I designed a galaxy themed Syndra skin. 
I'm not really sure about the name in the title, but that is not what's important right now.
so...
am I the only one who thinks this skin is extremly obvious? 
I think it fits her perfectly, and I hope one day a similar skin will be released for her.
But since no one made one yet, I made a concept art of it, just to show my idea to you guys.
The concept art is not that accurate though...

Full body:
http://fs5.directupload.net/images/151215/fd3znaen.png
I wanted her to have a strict appearance, that's why her hair is all tied up and her whole body is covered. 
Her shoulders are puffed up, her skin is blue and the cloth which hangs from her hip looks like nebula, so it fits the space theme.
The signs on her clothes and hip armor are inspired of the "Alien signs" in cornfields. So it seems a little bit extraordinary~
About her hair: Syndra mostly has her hair floating behind her, so to fit that scheme you couId add a nebula veil. But personally I think it looks better without it.
A little additional idea are her complete black eyes, to make her look more like an alien. I think that would be reeeally cool!

Mask:
http://fs5.directupload.net/images/151215/cwfulal9.png
I dont know why I drew this, but at least you can see how the veil is attached to the mask.
A very important thing to me is, that the gem on her forehead is the sign of the sun.
It's because her spheres are planets which surround her costantly. It makes sense.
I also covered her ears with gemlike objects, because Syndras ears are also always covered with something.

Abilities:
http://i.imgur.com/3MUepUu.png
Auto: could be falling stars or also mini meteors.
Spheres: I know there are no blueish, purple, glowing planets, but it should fit to the colors.
Q: I want the planet to appear with a big bang-like explosion. Then the cornfield sings appear on the ground.
W: When she grabs her planet it should look like the milky way.
E: The first idea is that it looks like a star rain. The second idea looks like these cornfield signs again.
R: The planets turn into meteors and attack the target.

The last thing, of which I didnt make a concept art of, is the recall animation:
You probably know this typical alien thing when they steal cows. A light cone appears an they float up.
Something like this with Syndra would be funny~

Thats about it.
What do you think?
